sentence.Network_en: Senior Chief Petty Officer Mendez reporting for duty, sir.
sentence.Network_cn: 高级军士长门德兹前来报道, 长官.

sentence.Network_en: Oscar Mendez wants to work for the US Border Patrol.
sentence.Network_cn: 奥斯卡门德斯希望工作在美国边境巡逻队.

sentence.Network_en: Chief Mendez stood over him. At his side was Lieutenant Ambrose.
sentence.Network_cn: 门德兹军士长站在他身后. 边上是安布罗斯中尉.

auth_sentence.content: The Mendez case effectively ended segregation as a matter of law in California.

auth_sentence.content: Then he plays "La Gloria Eres Tu" by Antonio Mendez, who composed and performed boleros in the 1950s.
